mapper.update: update b_planfile_inplan set inplanid=inplanid ,plandetailid=#{plandetailid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,producingYear=#{producingYear} ,grade=#{grade} ,tQty=#{tQty} ,tPrice=#{tPrice} ,amount=#{amount} ,planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} ,planEndDate=#{planEndDate} where inplanid=#{inplanid}

update b_planfile_inplan set inplanid=inplanid ,planfileid=#{planfileid} ,plandetailid=#{plandetailid} ,rowno=#{rowno} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,producingYear=#{producingYear} ,grade=#{grade} ,tQty=#{tQty} ,tPrice=#{tPrice} ,kGQty=#{kGQty} ,kGPrice=#{kGPrice} ,amount=#{amount} ,planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} ,planEndDate=#{planEndDate} ,execKGQty=#{execKGQty} ,execTQty=#{execTQty} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,spstatus=#{spstatus} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,spremark=#{spremark} where 1=1 and inplanid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and inplanid =#{Where_Id} and inplanid=#{Where_inplanid} and planfileid=#{Where_planfileid} and plandetailid=#{Where_plandetailid} and rowno=#{Where_rowno} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and producingYear=#{Where_producingYear} and grade=#{Where_grade} and tQty=#{Where_tQty} and tPrice=#{Where_tPrice} and kGQty=#{Where_kGQty} and kGPrice=#{Where_kGPrice} and amount=#{Where_amount} and planBeginDate=#{Where_planBeginDate} and planEndDate=#{Where_planEndDate} and execKGQty=#{Where_execKGQty} and execTQty=#{Where_execTQty} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and spstatus=#{Where_spstatus} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and spremark=#{Where_spremark}
mapper.select: select t.inplanid "inplanid", t.planfileid "planfileid", t.plandetailid "plandetailid", t.rowno "rowno", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.producingYear "producingYear", t.grade "grade", t.tQty "tQty", t.tPrice "tPrice", t.kGQty "kGQty", t.kGPrice "kGPrice", t.amount "amount", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate", t.execKGQty "execKGQty", t.execTQty "execTQty", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spstatus "spstatus", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spremark "spremark", bp.planTypeID "planTypeID", bp.planNo "planNo", lg.grainname "grainname" from b_planfile_inplan t LEFT JOIN b_planfile_detail bpd on bpd.plandetailid=t.plandetailid LEFT JOIN b_planfile bp on bp.planfileid=bpd.planfileid LEFT JOIN l_grain lg on lg.grainid=bpd.grainid where inplanid=#{inplanid}

select t.inplanid "inplanid", t.planfileid "planfileid", t.plandetailid "plandetailid", t.rowno "rowno", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.producingYear "producingYear", t.grade "grade", t.tQty "tQty", t.tPrice "tPrice", t.kGQty "kGQty", t.kGPrice "kGPrice", t.amount "amount", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate", t.execKGQty "execKGQty", t.execTQty "execTQty", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spstatus "spstatus", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spremark "spremark" from b_planfile_inplan t where 1=1 and t.inplanid=#{inplanid} and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.plandetailid=#{plandetailid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.producingYear=#{producingYear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.tQty=#{tQty} and t.tPrice=#{tPrice} and t.kGQty=#{kGQty} and t.kGPrice=#{kGPrice} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate} and t.execKGQty=#{execKGQty} and t.execTQty=#{execTQty} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spstatus=#{spstatus} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spremark=#{spremark}

select t.inplanid "inplanid", t.planfileid "planfileid", t.plandetailid "plandetailid", t.rowno "rowno", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.producingYear "producingYear", t.grade "grade", t.tQty "tQty", t.tPrice "tPrice", t.kGQty "kGQty", t.kGPrice "kGPrice", t.amount "amount", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate", t.execKGQty "execKGQty", t.execTQty "execTQty", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spstatus "spstatus", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spremark "spremark" from b_planfile_inplan t where 1=1 and t.inplanid=#{inplanid} and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.plandetailid=#{plandetailid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.producingYear=#{producingYear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.tQty=#{tQty} and t.tPrice=#{tPrice} and t.kGQty=#{kGQty} and t.kGPrice=#{kGPrice} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate} and t.execKGQty=#{execKGQty} and t.execTQty=#{execTQty} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spstatus=#{spstatus} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spremark=#{spremark}
mapper.delete: delete from b_planfile_inplan where 1=1 and inplanid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and inplanid =#{Where_Id} and inplanid=#{Where_inplanid} and planfileid=#{Where_planfileid} and plandetailid=#{Where_plandetailid} and rowno=#{Where_rowno} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and producingYear=#{Where_producingYear} and grade=#{Where_grade} and tQty=#{Where_tQty} and tPrice=#{Where_tPrice} and kGQty=#{Where_kGQty} and kGPrice=#{Where_kGPrice} and amount=#{Where_amount} and planBeginDate=#{Where_planBeginDate} and planEndDate=#{Where_planEndDate} and execKGQty=#{Where_execKGQty} and execTQty=#{Where_execTQty} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and spstatus=#{Where_spstatus} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and spremark=#{Where_spremark}
mapper.select: select t.inplanid "inplanid", t.planfileid "planfileid", t.plandetailid "plandetailid", t.rowno "rowno", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.producingYear "producingYear", t.grade "grade", t.tQty "tQty", t.tPrice "tPrice", t.kGQty "kGQty", t.kGPrice "kGPrice", t.amount "amount", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate", t.execKGQty "execKGQty", t.execTQty "execTQty", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spstatus "spstatus", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spremark "spremark", bp.planTypeID "planTypeID", bp.planNo "planNo", lg.grainname "grainname" from b_planfile_inplan t LEFT JOIN b_planfile_detail bpd on bpd.plandetailid=t.plandetailid LEFT JOIN b_planfile bp on bp.planfileid=bpd.planfileid LEFT JOIN l_grain lg on lg.grainid=bpd.grainid where 1=1 and bp.planNo like #{planNo} and t.inplanid=#{inplanid} and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.plandetailid=#{plandetailid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.producingYear=#{producingYear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.tQty=#{tQty} and t.tPrice=#{tPrice} and t.kGQty=#{kGQty} and t.kGPrice=#{kGPrice} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate} and t.execKGQty=#{execKGQty} and t.execTQty=#{execTQty} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spstatus=#{spstatus} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spremark=#{spremark}

select count(*) from b_planfile_inplan t LEFT JOIN b_planfile_detail bpd on bpd.plandetailid=t.plandetailid LEFT JOIN b_planfile bp on bp.planfileid=bpd.planfileid LEFT JOIN l_grain lg on lg.grainid=bpd.grainid where 1=1 and bp.planNo like #{planNo} and t.inplanid=#{inplanid} and t.inplanid!=#{NoId} and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.plandetailid=#{plandetailid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.producingYear=#{producingYear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.tQty=#{tQty} and t.tPrice=#{tPrice} and t.kGQty=#{kGQty} and t.kGPrice=#{kGPrice} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate} and t.execKGQty=#{execKGQty} and t.execTQty=#{execTQty} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spstatus=#{spstatus} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spremark=#{spremark}
